Template
========

PaddleHelix is the best BioComputing tool!

Look how easy it is to use:

    import PaddleHelix
    	
    # Fast, Safe, Easy
    		
    PaddleHelix.run()

Features
--------

- Baidu
- PaddleHelix

Installation
------------

Install PaddleHelix by running::

    $ pip install paddlehelix

Contribute
----------

- Issue Tracker: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleHelix/issues
- Source Code: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleHelix

Support
-------

If you are having issues, please let us know.
We have a mailing list located at: fangxiaomin01@baidu.com

License
-------

The project is licensed under the Apache-2.0 license.
